original: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du kha che chen pos rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du kha che chen pos rtogs pa rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /

analyzed: // / de nas 'di las de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o //

original: ci zhig de kho na nyid du brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig de kho na nyid du brjod par bya zhe na /

original: yod min med yin yod med min //
analyzed: yod min med yin yod med min //

original: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid min pa'ang min //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid min pa'ang min //

original: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'o //
analyzed: mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'o //

analyzed: de kho na nyid bde ba chen por rig /'di yi don ni 'di yin te //

analyzed: dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: zla ba'i nyams pa ni nag po'i phyogs te thabs so //

analyzed: de ltar na dkar po ni mtshan mo'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i sku shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste /

analyzed: yod med min te 'di dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir tshogs pa med do //

analyzed: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid med pa yang min //

analyzed: zhes pa ni nag po dang dkar po'i phyogs 'di dag las @87b ma gtogs pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba de med do //

analyzed: de ltar mtha' bzhi yongs su dag pa cha bcu drug pa stong pa nyid kyi chos can ni lhan cig skyes pa'i skur brjod par bya ste /

analyzed: bzhi pa zad pa las rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o //

original: de ltar ma ning ngo zhes grub po //
analyzed: de ltar ma ning ngo zhes grub po //

original: lha mo bzhis zhus par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: lha mo bzhis zhus par yang gsungs pa /

analyzed: thub pa chen po'i chos phung po //

original: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la //

original: gang rnams de nyid mi shes pa //
analyzed: gang rnams de nyid mi shes pa //

analyzed: de rnams thams cad 'bras bu med // ces so // de nyid rin chen ma thob par //

analyzed: nam yang dngos grub min pa nyid //

original: zhing rab rnam par dag gyur kyang ;
analyzed: zhing rab rnam par dag gyur kyang ;

original: / sa bon med par myu gu bzhin //
analyzed: / sa bon med par myu gu bzhin //

analyzed: zhes so // ngo bos gzugs med ces pa la sogs pa gsal bar bya ste /

analyzed: ngo bo ni rang gis rig par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The nature is the wisdom of the tathagatas, which is to be known by oneself.

original: ngo bo des te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa byed pa dang / 'dzin pa khams bco brgyad kyi rnam par 'gyur ba dang bral ba des rnal 'byor pa rnams la phyi rol gyi gzugs med mthong ba po med /
analyzed: ngo bo des te gzung ba dang 'dzin pa byed pa dang / 'dzin pa khams bco brgyad kyi rnam par 'gyur ba dang bral ba des rnal 'byor pa rnams la phyi rol gyi gzugs med mthong ba po med /
translated: By that nature, that is, by being free from the transformations of the apprehended, the apprehender, and the eighteen constituents of the apprehender, yogis and yoginis see no external form, no seer,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa med /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa med /
translated: no eye consciousness,

original: de bzhin du thos pa po med //
analyzed: de bzhin du thos pa po med //
translated: and likewise no hearer,🔽no ear consciousness,🔽and so forth.

original: sgra med rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: sgra med rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no sound, and no auditory consciousness.

original: de bzhin du dri med snom pa po med /
analyzed: de bzhin du dri med snom pa po med /

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa med do //

original: de bzhin du ro med myong ba po med lce'i rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ro med myong ba po med lce'i rnam par shes pa med do //

original: de bzhin du reg bya med reg pa po med /
analyzed: de bzhin du reg bya med reg pa po med /

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: and no tactile consciousness.

original: de bzhin du chos kyi khams med /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos kyi khams med /

analyzed: 'dzin pa po med yid kyi rnam par shes pa med do //

original: de ltar mig la sogs pa rnams kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar mig la sogs pa rnams kyang yod pa ma yin te /

analyzed: de ltar khams bco brgyad dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid rin po che rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o //

original: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang gsungs pa /

original: gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: sa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o ;

analyzed: / chu'i khams dang me'i khams rlung gi khams dang / stong pa nyid kyi khams la gnas par mi bya'o zhes so //

original: 'di nyid du gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: 'di nyid du gsungs pa yang /

analyzed: mchog dgar bsgom bya med cing sgom pa po yang med //

analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //

analyzed: reg pa 'gog pa yis kyang ni // tshor ba nges par 'gag par byed //

analyzed: tshor ba nges par 'gog pa yis // sred pa yang ni 'gag par byed //

analyzed: srid pa 'gog pa yis kyang ni // skye ba'ang nges par 'gag par byed //

analyzed: rga shi nges par 'gog par byed //

original: de nyid nye bar zhi bar brjod //
analyzed: de nyid nye bar zhi bar brjod //

analyzed: ming dang gzugs ma yin /

original: skye mched drug ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma yin /

original: reg pa ma yin /
analyzed: reg pa ma yin /

original: tshor ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba ma yin /
translated: feeling,

original: sred pa ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa ma yin /
translated: craving,

original: len pa ma yin /
analyzed: len pa ma yin /
translated: grasping,

original: srid pa ma yin /
analyzed: srid pa ma yin /
translated: existence,

original: skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba ma yin /
translated: birth,

original: rga shi ma yin /
analyzed: rga shi ma yin /
translated: or old age and death.

analyzed: de ltar sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'gog pas lus kyang 'gog pa'o //

analyzed: 'pho ba'i skad cig 'gog pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid do //

analyzed: sdug bsngal 'gog pas nyon mongs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin te //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'byung ba med pas las 'byung ba ma yin pa kho na'o // sad pa rmi lam shin tu gnyid //

analyzed: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs bzhi po yis //

original: rgyu 'bras gang tshe 'gags de'i tshe //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras gang tshe 'gags de'i tshe //
translated: When cause and effect are stopped,

original: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med //

analyzed: da ni de sgrub pa'i ched du kun rdzob kyi phyag rgya brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: / rnal 'byor zhes pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i sems dag gcig pa nyid de //
translated: Here, yogin means the unity of the mind of the object and the subject.

original: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag gcig pa /
analyzed: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag gcig pa /
translated: La la na and ra sa na are one.

analyzed: gtum mo dang khu ba dag gcig pa ste de las nges par grub pa'i dbang phyug khu ba ma 'phos pa'i tshangs par spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde bas shes rab dang thabs snyoms par 'jug pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: Tum mo and semen are one. From that, the lord of accomplishment, the celibacy of the non-emitted semen, by the bliss of the unchanging, should worship with the union of wisdom and method.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /

analyzed: 'dir rgyud rnams thams cad du ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams thun mong du gsungs te /

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams rjes su chags par byed pa'i ched du'o //

analyzed: de yang byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yin gyi /

original: gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for others.

original: gzhan 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bud med rnams gnas skabs kyi dbye bas ma la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bud med rnams gnas skabs kyi dbye bas ma la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur ro //
translated: Other women, in terms of worldly convention, become mothers and so forth through the division of their life stages.

original: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa bud med la sems par byed na /
analyzed: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa bud med la sems par byed na /
translated: Here, when the yogi is thinking of a woman,

original: de'i tshe sems kyis bsam par byas pas ma ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe sems kyis bsam par byas pas ma ru 'gyur ro //
translated: at that time, through the thought of the mind, she becomes a mother.

original: reg pas ni sring mo'o //
analyzed: reg pas ni sring mo'o //
translated: Through contact, she becomes a sister.

original: rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor 'gyur /
analyzed: rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor 'gyur /
translated: Through the vajra entering, she becomes a daughter.

original: byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bar gyur pa ni sring mo'i bu mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bar gyur pa ni sring mo'i bu mor 'gyur ro //
translated: With activity and great joy, she becomes a sister’s daughter.

original: thig le ltung bar gyur pas na chung ma'o //
analyzed: thig le ltung bar gyur pas na chung ma'o //
translated: Through the falling of the bindu, she becomes a wife.

original: gzhan gyi rigs gyur gtum mo'i rnal 'byor mar ni 'dod chags nyams par gyur pa las te chags bral las 'gyur @89a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rigs gyur gtum mo'i rnal 'byor mar ni 'dod chags nyams par gyur pa las te chags bral las 'gyur @89a * //
translated: Through the loss of passion, she becomes a yoginī of the fierce female of another family.

original: ro ; ;'di rnams rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste rnal 'byor pas sa la sogs pa rnams su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ro ; ;'di rnams rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste rnal 'byor pas sa la sogs pa rnams su rig par bya'o //
translated: These are the six seals of the yogin, which the yogin should know as earth, etc.

original: phyi rol du ni rigs dang yul gyi tha snyad kyis ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni rigs dang yul gyi tha snyad kyis ma la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Externally, they are mother, etc., by the convention of caste and country.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And so:

original: gar ma tshos ma g-yung mo dang // gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo //
analyzed: gar ma tshos ma g-yung mo dang // gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo //
translated: The dancer, the cook, the prostitute, the violent woman, and the brahmin woman,

original: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas zhes pa /
translated: are to be known by the yogin.

original: sngar bshad pa yi cho gas dang / shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa yi cho gas dang / shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis //
translated: By the rite explained before, and by the rite of wisdom and means,

original: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //🔽dus thams cad du mi 'pho ba'i bde bas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod // dus thams cad du mi 'pho ba'i bde bas //
translated: the yogin should always worship with the six.

original: 'bad pa yis ni bsten par bya //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni bsten par bya //
translated: With effort one should rely on the bliss that does not move at all times.

original: phyi rol du ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba ni nges pa'i don gyis byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba ni nges pa'i don gyis byang chub kyi sems 'pho ba'o //
translated: Externally, one should not let it move out, which is the definitive meaning of the non-emission of bodhicitta.

original: drang pa'i don gyis phyi rol du skye bos smod pa'o //
analyzed: drang pa'i don gyis phyi rol du skye bos smod pa'o //
translated: By the interpretable meaning, it is the censure of the world.

original: de'i phyir ma la sogs pa rnams la gsal bor bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma la sogs pa rnams la gsal bor bsten par bya ba ma yin no zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not clearly rely on one's mother, etc. This is the rule of the Lord.

original: gang gi tshe gsal por bsten na rgyal rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la sdug bsngal ster bar byed do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gsal por bsten na rgyal rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la sdug bsngal ster bar byed do //
translated: When one clearly relies on them, the Ksatriyas, etc. inflict suffering on the yogis who are like children.

original: gang phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: Since she generates living beings,

original: shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: she is called wisdom woman.

original: rdul gyi khams so //
analyzed: rdul gyi khams so //
translated: The element of dust.

original: de bzhin du thabs ni khu ba'i khams so //
analyzed: de bzhin du thabs ni khu ba'i khams so //
translated: Similarly, the means is the element of semen.

original: rdul dang khu ba las yang dag par byung ba ni ma la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdul dang khu ba las yang dag par byung ba ni ma la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: From dust and semen come mothers, etc.

original: gang phyir rnam dbye ston pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir rnam dbye ston pa'i phyir //
translated: Since she shows the distinctions,

original: shes rab de nyid sring mor brjod par bya ste khams kyi rnam 'gyur so so ba spu dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag go //
analyzed: shes rab de nyid sring mor brjod par bya ste khams kyi rnam 'gyur so so ba spu dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag go //
translated: she is called sister, the transformation of the elements, namely, hair, skin, flesh, and blood.

original: de bzhin du sring mo'i bu mo ni rtsa dang rus pa dang rkang gi rnam par dbye ba'i cha ru 'jug par byed pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du sring mo'i bu mo ni rtsa dang rus pa dang rkang gi rnam par dbye ba'i cha ru 'jug par byed pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Likewise, the daughter of the sister is the one who enters into the parts that are the divisions of the channels, bones, and marrow.

original: shes rab de nyid ni /
analyzed: shes rab de nyid ni /
translated: That very wisdom

original: yon tan 'jo phyir bu mor yang brjod par bya ste yon tan gyi tshig gis ni sgra dang / reg dang ro dang gzugs dang dri'i khams kyi yul rnams yin te /
analyzed: yon tan 'jo phyir bu mor yang brjod par bya ste yon tan gyi tshig gis ni sgra dang / reg dang ro dang gzugs dang dri'i khams kyi yul rnams yin te /
translated: is also called the daughter because she enjoys the qualities. The word quality refers to the objects of the elements of sound, touch, taste, form, and smell.

original: de rnams 'jo ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams 'jo ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because she enjoys those.

original: zhes pa'o // shes rab ni chung mar brjod par bya ste chags bral du mi byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽reg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir mthar skyes mar brjod par bya'o zhes pa phyag rgya drug gi nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // shes rab ni chung mar brjod par bya ste chags bral du mi byed pa'i phyir ro // reg par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir mthar skyes mar brjod par bya'o zhes pa phyag rgya drug gi nges pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is called the wife because she does not cause one to be free from attachment.🔽Because she is not to be touched, she is called the sister.

original: khams thams cad kyi bde mnyam gyi ro 'bab par byed pa'i phyir de kho na bram ze mo zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: khams thams cad kyi bde mnyam gyi ro 'bab par byed pa'i phyir de kho na bram ze mo zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Because she causes the taste of the bliss of all the elements to flow, she is called the Brahmin woman.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: It is also said:

original: rnam par mi rtog khams mi zad //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog khams mi zad //
translated: The nonconceptual element is inexhaustible.

original: chos khams dam pa zad pa med //
analyzed: chos khams dam pa zad pa med //
translated: The holy element is the imperishable.

original: ces so // 'tshed phyir @89b shes rab tshos ma'o //
analyzed: ces so // 'tshed phyir @89b shes rab tshos ma'o //
translated: Because of cooking, it is the cook.

original: khams rnams g-yo phyir gar ma'o //
analyzed: khams rnams g-yo phyir gar ma'o //
translated: Because of moving the elements, it is the dancer.

original: gtum pa'i las ni byed pa'i phyir //🔽gtum mo ru ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: gtum pa'i las ni byed pa'i phyir // gtum mo ru ni brjod pa yin //
translated: Because of performing the function of the fierce one,🔽it is called the fierce one.

original: reg min phyir ni g-yung mor bshad //
analyzed: reg min phyir ni g-yung mor bshad //
translated: Because of being intangible, it is explained as the tortoise.

original: de ltar bya ba lnga'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: de ltar bya ba lnga'i rang bzhin las //
translated: Thus, from the nature of the five actions,

original: bram ze ma sogs shes par bya //
analyzed: bram ze ma sogs shes par bya //
translated: the brahmin woman and so on should be known.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis bud med thams cad dang skyes pa thams cad mi'i rigs gcig tu yang dag par byung ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis bud med thams cad dang skyes pa thams cad mi'i rigs gcig tu yang dag par byung ba ste /
translated: Therefore, all women and all men are truly of one human caste by nature.

original: de rnams la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes pa rgyud thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la rigs gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes pa rgyud thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: They do not have another caste. This is the definitive statement of the Tathāgata in all tantras.

original: rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba //🔽thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba // thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya //
translated: The so-called mudrā of the five families🔽is said to be the cause of liberation.

original: zhes pa / thar pa zhes pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba thob pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa / thar pa zhes pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba thob pa ste /
translated: “Liberation” is the attainment of supreme, unchanging bliss.

original: de kho na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyu'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: de kho na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyu'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
translated: That is the cause of the yogins and yoginis of reality.

original: 'dir thar pa'i rgyur phyag rgya zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs can rnams yin la /
analyzed: 'dir thar pa'i rgyur phyag rgya zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs can rnams yin la /
translated: Here, the cause of liberation is the seal, which is the one who has the nature of the five Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje yis te /
analyzed: rdo rje yis te /
translated: By the vajra,

original: byang chub sems 'dis rgyas gdab bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems 'dis rgyas gdab bya //
translated: one should seal with this bodhicitta.

original: zhes pa phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhes pa phyag rgya ste /
translated: This is the seal.

original: aa ba dh'u t'i 'o //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i 'o //
translated: It is in the avadhuti.

original: 'dir rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'khrags 'khrugs su gsungs mod rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pas ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams 'khrags 'khrugs su gsungs mod rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Here, although the seals of mother and so forth are taught in a jumbled order by the vajra and so forth, they should be taken in the proper order.

original: 'dir ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang bram ze mo dang spyan ma dang lte ba'i padma dang / sa'i khams so //
analyzed: 'dir ma ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang bram ze mo dang spyan ma dang lte ba'i padma dang / sa'i khams so //
translated: Here, mother is the Tathagata family, the Brahmin woman, Locana, the navel lotus, and the earth element.

original: sring mo ni m'a ma k'i dang / snying gar rdo rje'i rigs can dang g-yung mo dang chu'i khams kyi rigs so /
analyzed: sring mo ni m'a ma k'i dang / snying gar rdo rje'i rigs can dang g-yung mo dang chu'i khams kyi rigs so /
translated: Sister is Mamaki, the heart, the vajra family, the candali, and the water element family.🔽Daughter is Pandara, the head, the lotus family, the dakini, and the fire element family.

original: padma'i rigs can ma ni bu mo dang / gar ma dang / gos dkar mo dang / mgrin pa dang / me'i khams so //
analyzed: padma'i rigs can ma ni bu mo dang / gar ma dang / gos dkar mo dang / mgrin pa dang / me'i khams so //
translated: The lotus family is the daughter, the dancer, Pāṇḍaravāsinī, the throat, and the fire constituent.

original: las kyi rigs can ma ni tshos ma dang dpral bar te sring mo'i bu mo dang sgrol ma dang rlung gi khams so //🔽chung ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang / rin po che'i rigs dang gtum mo dang / gtsug tor du nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: las kyi rigs can ma ni tshos ma dang dpral bar te sring mo'i bu mo dang sgrol ma dang rlung gi khams so // chung ma ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dang / rin po che'i rigs dang gtum mo dang / gtsug tor du nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: The action family is the dyer, the forehead, the sister’s daughter, Tārā, and the wind constituent.🔽The wife is Vajradhātvīśvarī, the jewel family, Caṇḍālī, the crown, and the space constituent.

original: mthar skyes ma ni ye shes kyi khams dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs can ma dang gsang ba'i padmar ro //
analyzed: mthar skyes ma ni ye shes kyi khams dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs can ma dang gsang ba'i padmar ro //
translated: The final-born is the gnosis constituent, the Vajrasattva family, and the secret lotus.

original: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
analyzed: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
translated: The glorious one goes to suchness

original: de bzhin slar yang byon pa nyid //
analyzed: de bzhin slar yang byon pa nyid //
translated: and returns again to suchness.

original: shes rab ldan pa 'di yis ni //
analyzed: shes rab ldan pa 'di yis ni //
translated: The one endowed with wisdom

original: de bzhin gshegs pa brjod par bya //🔽zhes pa shes rab stong pa nyid 'di dang lhan cig ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa brjod par bya // zhes pa shes rab stong pa nyid 'di dang lhan cig ldan pa ste /
translated: is said to be the Tathāgata.🔽This wisdom is emptiness endowed with the most sublime of manifestations.

original: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs dang lhan cig pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs dang lhan cig pa'o //
translated: It is the form of emptiness.

original: de bzhin nyid du ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du ste /
translated: In suchness,

original: gsang ba'i padmar @90a * //
analyzed: gsang ba'i padmar @90a * //
translated: in the secret lotus,🔽the vajra reaches the end of the jewel, and enters the forehead, throat, heart, navel, and secret lotus, from the crown aperture of the sky element, the stage of nonabiding nirvana.🔽The vajra of wisdom, the nature of wind, fire, water, earth, and the bhaga of the vajra queen, enters those places.

original: rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la gtsug tor nam mkha'i khams nas dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga dang / lte ba dang gsang ba'i padma rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang / ye shes gyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga rnams su zhugs par gyur to zhes pa dpal ldan byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu'i mthar thug par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la gtsug tor nam mkha'i khams nas dpral ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga dang / lte ba dang gsang ba'i padma rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang / ye shes gyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje btsun mo'i bha ga rnams su zhugs par gyur to zhes pa dpal ldan byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje gshegs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the vajra of glorious bodhicitta has arrived.

original: de bzhin byon pa zhes pa ji ltar 'gog gi char gshegs pa de ltar byon pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin byon pa zhes pa ji ltar 'gog gi char gshegs pa de ltar byon pa ste /
translated: “Having arrived in that way” means that just as it arrived in the aspect of cessation, it has arrived in that way.

original: rdo rje nor bu dang gsang ba'i padma ye shes kyi khams nas lte ba dang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang / gtsug tor du gyen du khu ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu dang gsang ba'i padma ye shes kyi khams nas lte ba dang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang / gtsug tor du gyen du khu ba'o //
translated: The seminal essence ascends from the element of wisdom in the vajra jewel and the secret lotus to the navel, heart, throat, forehead, and crown aperture.

original: de ltar na ji ltar byon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes grub bo //
analyzed: de ltar na ji ltar byon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes grub bo //
translated: Thus, it is established that the arrival is the arrival in that way.

original: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos 'phags kyi le'ur gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos 'phags kyi le'ur gsungs pa yang /
translated: The chapter of the noble Dharmodgata in the glorious Perfection of Wisdom🔽says:

original: de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ce sa smras so //
analyzed: de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ce sa smras so //
translated: When this was said, the bodhisattva great being Dharmodgata said to the bodhisattva great being Sadaprarudita:

original: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nges par 'ga' zhig nas byon pa'am bzhud pa med de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nges par 'ga' zhig nas byon pa'am bzhud pa med de /
translated: “Son of good family, the tathāgatas do not come from anywhere or go anywhere.

original: de bzhin nyid ni g-yo ba med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni g-yo ba med pa ste /
translated: Suchness is unmoving.

original: gang de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: gang de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: That suchness is the tathāgata.

original: rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de //
translated: Son of good family, non-arising does not come or go.

original: gang skye ba med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: gang skye ba med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: That non-arising is the tathāgata.

original: rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba rab tu shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba rab tu shes pa ma yin te /
translated: Son of good family, the limit of reality is not known to come or go.

original: gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: That limit of reality is the tathāgata.”

original: rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro bar rab tu gdags pa med de gang stong pa nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro bar rab tu gdags pa med de gang stong pa nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: Son of noble family, in emptiness there is no designation of coming or going. That which is emptiness is the Tathāgata.

original: rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin nyid la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro bar rab tu gdags pa med de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin nyid la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro bar rab tu gdags pa med de /
translated: Son of noble family, in suchness there is no designation of coming or going.

original: gang ji lta ba bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: gang ji lta ba bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //
translated: That which is suchness is the Tathāgata.

original: dpal rdo rje rtse mor yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rtse mor yang gsungs pa /
translated: The glorious Vajra Peak also teaches:

original: de kho na nyid chos gnas pas //
analyzed: de kho na nyid chos gnas pas //
translated: The reality of phenomena

original: de bzhin ma yin slar mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin ma yin slar mi 'gyur //
translated: is not otherwise, not changing.

original: de kho na nyid lam ston pa //
analyzed: de kho na nyid lam ston pa //
translated: The teacher of the path of reality

original: de bzhin gshegs par de brjod bya //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs par de brjod bya //
translated: is called the Tathāgata.

original: dpal mtshan yang dag bar brjod par yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal mtshan yang dag bar brjod par yang gsungs pa /
translated: The glorious Expression of the Real Names also teaches:

original: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
translated: The one eye of wisdom is stainless.

original: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
translated: The Tathāgata has a body of wisdom.

original: zhes so // de bzhin du dpal shes rab @90b kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'jig rten ston pa'i le'ur yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du dpal shes rab @90b kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'jig rten ston pa'i le'ur yang gsungs pa /
translated: Similarly, the chapter on teaching the world in the glorious Perfection of Wisdom teaches:

original: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: The elder Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das ci lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ci lags /
translated: Bhagavān, is it so?🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kho na bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kho na bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa /
translated: Blessed One, is it the Tathāgata himself who is inconceivable, unequaled,

original: gzhal du med pa /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa /

analyzed: zhes so // pha rol phyin zhes pa ni dpal theg pa chen po phul du byung ba la gnas shing rgal dka' ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho las shin tu 'das pa'o //

analyzed: ces pa la sogs pa'o //

original: 'di'i nges pa'i don ni rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa /

analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so forth.

original: chu'i khams dad me'i khams ro mnyam pa mchog gi go 'phang shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor dbang po dang bcas pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhes pa'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams dad me'i khams ro mnyam pa mchog gi go 'phang shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor dbang po dang bcas pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhes pa'o //
translated: The water element and the fire element are of the nature of wisdom and method, and the lord of yogins is the supreme state of equal taste. That is the reflection of the Buddha.

original: 'di las goo r'i la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: 'di las goo r'i la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur zhing //
translated: From this, the Gaurī and so forth arise.

original: kha dog dbye bas so so gzhan //
analyzed: kha dog dbye bas so so gzhan //
translated: By the division of colors, each is different.

original: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: da ni snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge bsams nas /
analyzed: da ni snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge bsams nas /
translated: Now, having visualized the seed syllables of the deities on the maṇḍala of the moon at the heart,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par dag par byas te /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par dag par byas te /
translated: one should purify the gate of liberation and so forth.

original: nam mkha'i mthil du ye shes kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spros nas de rnams la mchod pa byas te //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthil du ye shes kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spros nas de rnams la mchod pa byas te //
translated: In the center of space, the light rays of the seed syllable of pristine consciousness emanate the tathāgatas and bodhisattvas, who are offered worship.

original: sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / gsum @100b la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lam la brten pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dngos po 'bul ba dang / stong pa nyid du dmigs pa sngags pas bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / gsum @100b la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lam la brten pa dang / bdag nyid kyi dngos po 'bul ba dang / stong pa nyid du dmigs pa sngags pas bya'o //
translated: The mantra practitioner should confess misdeeds, rejoice in merit, go for refuge to the Three Jewels, generate bodhicitta, rely on the path, offer one’s body, and visualize emptiness.

original: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: 'dir mi mngal nas skyes pa rnams 'chi ba'i dus su /
analyzed: 'dir mi mngal nas skyes pa rnams 'chi ba'i dus su /
translated: Here, those born from a human womb, at the time of death,

original: sa yi khams ni chu la thim //
analyzed: sa yi khams ni chu la thim //
translated: the earth element dissolves into water,

original: chu ni me la thim pa ste //
analyzed: chu ni me la thim pa ste //
translated: water dissolves into fire,

original: me yang phra ba'i khams la'o //
analyzed: me yang phra ba'i khams la'o //
translated: and fire also dissolves into the subtle element.

original: rlung yang sems la rnam par thim //
analyzed: rlung yang sems la rnam par thim //
translated: Wind also dissolves into mind.

original: zhes pa'o // de ltar khams kyi tshogs myur du rnam par nyams pa /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de ltar khams kyi tshogs myur du rnam par nyams pa /
translated: Thus, the collection of elements quickly deteriorates.

original: nam mkha'i khams rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs brnyan yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
translated: The space element, the reflection of all forms, free from objects and aspects, is the middle. The consciousness of the ground of all should be placed there.

original: de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya ste //
analyzed: de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya ste //
translated: Then one should recite this mantra:

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ.

original: zhes brjod la khams gsum pa rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes pa /
analyzed: zhes brjod la khams gsum pa rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes pa /
translated: Having recited this, one should meditate on the emptiness that transcends the atomic reality of the three realms.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the definitive meaning of the Tathāgata.

original: de nas chos 'byung nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chos 'byung nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then one should meditate on the source of phenomena, the nature of the space element.

original: de'i dbus su h'um yig yongs su gyur pa rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dbus su h'um yig yongs su gyur pa rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
translated: In its center, from the transformation of the syllable hūṃ, one should meditate on the vajra ground and so forth. This is the provisional meaning.

original: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: da ni nges pa'i don gsal bar bya ste /
translated: Now I will clarify the definitive meaning.

original: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan du gsungs pa yang //
translated: It is also taught in other tantras:

original: rdo rje dang padma'i steng du gnas pa de las nges par byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang gi lha'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byas nas rdo rje'i tshig gis sngags kyi yi ge bkod de khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas bskyed par
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma'i steng du gnas pa de las nges par byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang gi lha'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byas nas rdo rje'i tshig gis sngags kyi yi ge bkod de khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas bskyed par
translated: Having become Vairochana, the nature of all Tathagatas and one's own deity, on the vajra and lotus, one should generate the palace by means of vajra speech, arranging the mantra syllables.

original: bya'o // de'i steng du sngags kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pas rgyal mchog tu gyur pa nor bu rin po che chen pos spras shing /
analyzed: bya'o // de'i steng du sngags kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pas rgyal mchog tu gyur pa nor bu rin po che chen pos spras shing /
translated: Above that, one should imagine the palace adorned with great jewels, the supreme of kings, with all the Tathagatas dwelling there by means of the mantra alone.

original: kha dog sna tshogs pa dril bu 'phyang zhing /
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs pa dril bu 'phyang zhing /
translated: It has various colors, with hanging bells,

original: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar dang ldan pa'i ba dan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang lda ldi dang / do shal dang do shal phyed pa dang // zla bas nye bar mdzes pa rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar dang ldan pa'i ba dan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang lda ldi dang / do shal dang do shal phyed pa dang // zla bas nye bar mdzes pa rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo can gyi gzhal yas khang pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: banners with cloth moved by the wind, flower garlands, streamers, necklaces, half-necklaces, and is beautified by moons, with a vajra-jewel peak.

original: gzhal yas khang pa ye shes su //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang pa ye shes su //
translated: The palace is wisdom.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid can //
translated: The secret maṇḍala has the characteristic

original: sems dang ye shes 'dres pa ste //
analyzed: sems dang ye shes 'dres pa ste //
translated: of the mixing of mind and gnosis.

original: bde ba chen po gsung du gsol //🔽dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mtha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom par gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: bde ba chen po gsung du gsol // dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mtha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom par gsungs pa yang /
translated: Please teach the great bliss.

original: dkyil 'khor gyis @101a * //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyis @101a * //
translated: The Tantra of the End of the Web of Jaḍa, which was taught by the glorious Buddha in the Tantra of the Union with All Buddhas, says:🔽Those who are inferior due to the maṇḍala,🔽who abandon the samayas,

original: ni dman pa dang // dam tshig rnams ni dor ba dang // gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes pas //
analyzed: ni dman pa dang // dam tshig rnams ni dor ba dang // gsang ba'i de nyid mi shes pas //
translated: and who do not know the reality of the secret

original: rdo rje sems dpa' grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' grub mi 'gyur //
translated: will not accomplish Vajrasattva.

original: zhes so // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: zhes so // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang //
translated: The Bhagavān also said:

original: sra mkhregs dkyil 'khor gsang ba che //
analyzed: sra mkhregs dkyil 'khor gsang ba che //
translated: The secret great maṇḍala of solidity

original: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //
translated: is stainless like space,

original: yid mi bde las rnam par grol //
analyzed: yid mi bde las rnam par grol //
translated: free from mental unhappiness,

original: rnam par rtog pa 'phrog pa'i mchog / ces so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa 'phrog pa'i mchog / ces so //
translated: and the supreme thief of conceptuality.

original: gsungs pa yang /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang /
translated: He also said:🔽The lord of migrating beings is born suddenly,

original: gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /'gro ba'i bdag po 'phral du skyes //
analyzed: gcig tu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /'gro ba'i bdag po 'phral du skyes //
translated: the sole lord of the vajra of solidity.

original: zhes so // nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
analyzed: zhes so // nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das //
translated: He is beyond all afflictive stains.

original: zla ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor sdug / sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir //
analyzed: zla ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor sdug / sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir //
translated: the qualities of all buddhas

original: a'a li'i gzugs las rab 'jug go //
analyzed: a'a li'i gzugs las rab 'jug go //
translated: enter into the form of the āli.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: And so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yon tan gyi khyad par ci lta bu lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yon tan gyi khyad par ci lta bu lags /
translated: What are the special qualities of the mandala of the moon of the Bhagavān?

original: dpal gsang ba'i dbang po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba'i dbang po'i thig ler gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in the Drop of the Glorious Secret Essence:

original: yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das //
translated: All limbs are beyond meditation,

original: rtogs pas brtag pa rnam par spangs //
analyzed: rtogs pas brtag pa rnam par spangs //
translated: realization is completely abandoned.

original: phyi mo thig le cha las 'das //
analyzed: phyi mo thig le cha las 'das //
translated: The primordial is beyond the part of the drop.

original: 'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa'o //
translated: This is the sublime mandala.

original: zhes so // dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa /
translated: And it is also said in the Stainless Light:

original: nyi ma'i steng du zla ba'i dbus su h'um yig zla ba'i mtshan ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: nyi ma'i steng du zla ba'i dbus su h'um yig zla ba'i mtshan ma lta bu'o //
translated: On top of the sun, in the middle of the moon, is the syllable hūṃ, like the sign of the moon.

original: de bzhin du rdul gyi steng du byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdul gyi steng du byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Likewise, on top of the rajas is the bodhicitta.

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi dbus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dri za'i sems can no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi dbus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dri za'i sems can no //
translated: In the middle of the bodhicitta is the all-base consciousness, the gandharva sentient being.

original: de nas me long la sogs pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de nas me long la sogs pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis zhes pa ni /
translated: and so on.

original: de la zla ba byang chub kyi sems dbyangs dang ldan pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de la zla ba byang chub kyi sems dbyangs dang ldan pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
translated: The moon, which is the bodhicitta endowed with melody, is the mirror-like pristine consciousness,

original: gzugs kyi phung po skyed par byed pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po skyed par byed pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: which generates the aggregate of form, which is Vairocana.

original: nyi ma dang rdul gsal byed dang ldan pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: nyi ma dang rdul gsal byed dang ldan pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: The sun, which is the clear-light particle endowed with the consonants, is the pristine consciousness of uniformity,

original: tshor ba'i phung po skyed par byed pa rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po skyed par byed pa rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: which generates the aggregate of feeling, which is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: dri za'i sems can h'um yig dang ldan pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: dri za'i sems can h'um yig dang ldan pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The gandharva sentient being endowed with the syllable hūṃ is the individually discerning pristine consciousness,

original: 'du shes kyi phung po skyed par byed pa 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po skyed par byed pa 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: which generates the aggregate of perception, which is Amitābha.

original: 'di rnams gcig pa nyid srog gi rlung ham yig dang ldan pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: 'di rnams gcig pa nyid srog gi rlung ham yig dang ldan pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te /
translated: These are the same, endowed with the life-force vāyu and the syllable haṃ, which is the pristine consciousness of successful activities,

original: 'du byed kyi phung po skyed par byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po skyed par byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
translated: which generates the aggregate of formation, which is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nas sku thams cad kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ham yig dang ldan pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de nas sku thams cad kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ham yig dang ldan pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Then, the complete part of all bodies, and consciousness endowed with the syllable ham, is the gnosis of the pure sphere of reality.🔽The consciousness aggregate that generates is Akṣobhya.

original: rnam @101b par shes pa'i phung po skyed par byed pa mi bskyod pa'o zhes pa phyi rol dang nang du ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rnam @101b par shes pa'i phung po skyed par byed pa mi bskyod pa'o zhes pa phyi rol dang nang du ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Thus, externally and internally, it is the nature of the five gnoses.

original: 'di rnams gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni sa bon te /
analyzed: 'di rnams gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni sa bon te /
translated: These all merge into one seed syllable.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' 'o zhes so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' 'o zhes so //
translated: That is Vajrasattva.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u bcu par gsungs pa /
analyzed: dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u bcu par gsungs pa /
translated: It is taught in the glorious Perfection of Wisdom in Ten Thousand Lines:

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ston pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ston pa'o //
translated: “Blessed One, this is the teaching of the inconceivable.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said:

original: gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: “Form is inconceivable.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are inconceivable.

original: rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes kyang 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes kyang 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: Subhūti, if one has no notion that form is inconceivable, one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes kyang 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes kyang 'du shes pa med na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes so //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, if one has no notion that feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are inconceivable, one practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa gsal bar bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa gsal bar bya ste /
translated: Now, the word vajrasattva should be clarified.

original: rdo rje ni mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni mchog tu bde ba'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Vajra is the wisdom of supreme bliss, the mind of enlightenment.

original: sems dpa' ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: sems dpa' ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i shes rab kyi gzugs brnyan no //
translated: Sattva is the reflection of wisdom in all aspects.

original: ye shes dang rnam par shes pas byin gyis brlabs pa sgrib pa med pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid /
analyzed: ye shes dang rnam par shes pas byin gyis brlabs pa sgrib pa med pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid /
translated: The reality of the consecration by intuition and consciousness, which is a single, undifferentiated, non-obstructed state,

original: 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don byed pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o //
translated: is the performance of the welfare of the world, which is Vajrasattva.

original: de'i gdan 'di ni rdo rje sems pa'i gdan te /
analyzed: de'i gdan 'di ni rdo rje sems pa'i gdan te /
translated: His seat is the seat of Vajrasattva.

original: gsungs pa yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa yang 'di lta ste /
translated: It is also said:

original: aa sogs ka sogs mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: aa sogs ka sogs mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: The union of the vowels and consonants🔽is the seat of Vajrasattva,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan du dang // 'gyur med las byung gong bu la //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan du dang // 'gyur med las byung gong bu la //
translated: the mass arisen from the immutable,

original: h'um phat yi ge mi 'dod do //
analyzed: h'um phat yi ge mi 'dod do //
translated: not desiring the syllables hum and phat.

original: zhes pa / 'gyur med 'di yis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par 'gyur ba mchog gi dbang po can //
analyzed: zhes pa / 'gyur med 'di yis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par 'gyur ba mchog gi dbang po can //
translated: The immutable is generated by this, and the supreme organ is the loss of change.

original: zhes pa la 'gyur ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'i gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid can te 'pho ba'i skad cig go //
analyzed: zhes pa la 'gyur ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'i gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid can te 'pho ba'i skad cig go //
translated: Change is characterized by the state of arising and perishing, the moment of transition.

original: de gang la 'gags par gyur pa de ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba 'pho ba med pa'i skad cig go //
analyzed: de gang la 'gags par gyur pa de ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba 'pho ba med pa'i skad cig go //
translated: That which has stopped changing is the supreme immutable, the moment of non-transition.

original: de nyid rdo rje ye shes zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje ye shes zhes pa'o //
translated: That itself is the intuition vajra.

original: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang //
analyzed: dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang //
translated: It is also said in the Glorious Expression of Manjushri's Names:

original: gsang sngags skye gnas 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: gsang sngags skye gnas 'gyur ba med //
translated: The source of secret mantra is unchanging.

original: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
translated: The great secret mantra is the three families.

original: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
analyzed: gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po //
translated: The secret mantra is the producer of all meanings.
